title: how to select elements in a tensor by 2d index?
body_html:
Hi! I need to select elements by 2d index, just like in numpy:
label =[10,15,20]
probs= numpy.random.rand(3,40)
target_probs = probs[numpy.arange(probs.shape[0]), label]

this function is needed while I'm doing reinforcement learning, and I want to log the expected rewards while training.

body:
Hi! I need to select elements by 2d index, just like in numpy:
label =[10,15,20]
probs= numpy.random.rand(3,40)
target_probs = probs[numpy.arange(probs.shape[0]), label]

this function is needed while I'm doing reinforcement learning, and I want to log the expected rewards while training.
